title: Key Management
description: This page displays API key information for all accounts, including usage and expiration time. You can create new keys for specific accounts by clicking the 'Add Key' button in the upper right corner or the '+' button next to each key item. Please keep your API keys safe and avoid leaking them to others
pleaseSelectFirst: Please select an account first to view key list

messages.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete key {{name}}? This action cannot be undone
messages.deleteFailed: Failed to delete key, please try again later

dialog.modelSelectHint: Hold Ctrl/Cmd to select multiple models, {{count}} selected
dialog.ipPlaceholder: Leave empty for no limit, separate multiple IPs with commas
dialog.ipExample: Example: 192.168.1.1,10.0.0.1 or use * for no limit
dialog.editModeNoChange: Cannot change account in edit mode
dialog.updateFailed: Failed to update key, please try again later
dialog.createFailed: Failed to create key, please try again later
dialog.loadDataFailed: Failed to load data, please try again later
dialog.validExpiration: Expiration time must be greater than current time
dialog.validIp: Please enter valid IP addresses, separate multiple IPs with commas
